content: अधिजिह्वः [अधिका जिह्वा यस्य] A serpent (who has a forked tongue). This arose from the attempt of the serpents to lick the nectar placed on a bed of Kuśa grass, the sharp points of which pricked the tongue and split it into two. --ह्वा --जिह्विका [अधिरूढा जिह्वा, स्वार्थे कन्] {@--1@} The uvula. {@--2@} A sort of swelling of the tongue or epiglottis.
